trans-unit.source: Represents a control that enumerates table columns that can be filtered.
This type is obsolete.
Use <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>, instead.
In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The FilterRepeater control is a control in the ASP.NET Dynamic Data framework.
It automatically renders controls that can be used to filter data rows that are displayed for a table.
The filters work by providing a list of `Where` parameters to the data source for each supported column type.
By default, Dynamic Data filters foreign-key and Boolean columns and renders them by using a `DropDownList` list control.

The FilterRepeater control is a specialized <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control that automatically binds to a collection of filterable columns for the table that is displayed in the current page.
For example, if a request is made for /Products/List.aspx, the FilterRepeater control binds to the columns in the Products table.
The table is chosen based on the route that matches the request.

It can also be overridden by setting the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater.TableName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater.ContextTypeName%2A> properties of the FilterRepeater control.
To display the filter UI, the `ItemTemplate` template of the FilterRepeater control must contain a control with a known ID.
By default, the known ID is "DynamicFilter".
The control in the item template must derive from <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterUserControlBase>.
When data binding occurs, the FilterRepeater control initializes an instance of the filter control with information about the column to filter.
## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                           ```
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the name of the data-source object to use to retrieve the data.
The name of the data source object to use to retrieve the data.
Binds the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater"></xref> control to the data that is retrieved from a data source.
Gets or sets the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater"></xref> control in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.ItemTemplate*> instance.
The ID of the control used to display the filter UI in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.ItemTemplate*> instance, if an ID is specified; otherwise, "DynamicFilter".
Returns an enumeration of the sortable columns that belong to the table that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater"></xref> control.
By default, foreign-key columns and Boolean columns are sortable.
An enumeration of the sortable columns that belong to the table that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater"></xref> control.

Gets the list of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Where" name="Where" href=""></xref> parameters to add to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Where" name="Where" href=""></xref> parameter collection of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater"></xref> control.
The data source of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Where" name="Where" href=""></xref> parameters.
A list of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Where" name="Where" href=""></xref> parameters.
Called for every item and alternating item template that is being instantiated by this <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater"></xref> control during data binding.
You can override this method to customize the contents of the item template while the items are being created.
Data is available for each item when this method is called.
The contents of the item template.
Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event to initialize the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater"></xref> control.
The event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCreated"></xref> event.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCreated> event is raised when an item is created in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
The event data.
Gets the table that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater"></xref> control.
The table that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater"></xref> control.
Gets the name of the table to filter.
The name of the table to filter.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control is displayed.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is displayed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
